name: SkinWorld (Design & Programming demonstration)
description:
Welcome to SkinWorld, a grotesque world of nightmares!

I quickly slapped this game together to give an idea of what i do and my design in-depth design philosopies within games. due to this there is no sound that comes with the game! i may update it to have some sound options later though... Once you press start, the game is where you explore a luxury combat system! With freedom and versatility granted to almost all players!
